snippet: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media can add to the pain of family estrangements because they provide a peek into private lives and a reminder of what has been lost.
abstract: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media can add to the pain of family estrangements because they provide a peek into private lives and a reminder of what has been lost.
lead_paragraph: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media can add to the pain of family estrangements because they provide a peek into private lives and a reminder of what has been lost.

headline.main: In the Facebook Era, Reminders of Loss After Families Fracture
headline.print_headline: In the Facebook Era, Reminders Of Loss After Families Fracture
